overview: Have you ever wanted to see Stephanie Swift's personal fantasies? Then get ready for Swift Picks, an intimate glimpse inside the sexual psyche of one of porn's most celebrated performers! With a cast that includes reigning Euro-goddess Sylvia Saint, Stephanie brings her innermost fantasies to sexy life through six wildly imaginative scenes photographed by veteran director Mark Stone. Swift Picks. Check out the erotic visions of a truly Wicked Woman.
tagline: Stephanie picks the cream of the crop, exclusively for Wicked
title: Swift Picks
